triples.name: K-means clustering
triples.relevance: The paper replaces k-means clustering with division to accelerate granular ball generation

triples.name: Statistical classification
triples.relevance: Classification is the primary machine learning task that granular ball computing addresses

triples.name: Granular computing
triples.relevance: Granular ball computing is an efficient learning method based on the granular computing paradigm

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: The paper proposes accelerated and adaptive methods for granular ball generation as novel clustering techniques

triples.name: Adaptive algorithm
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new adaptive granular ball generation method that is parameter-free and completely self-adjusting
